body_html:
@zou3519, can you do the same thing for varOuterDim? https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/THCTensorMathReduce.cuh#L309.
It's much simpler as there is no reduction across the threads, so just repeating what you did for serial case will suffice.

@zou3519, can you do the same thing for varOuterDim? https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/THCTensorMathReduce.cuh#L309. 
It's much simpler as there is no reduction across the threads, so just repeating what you did for serial case will suffice.
